name: Party Pop
description:
Party Pop is a simple new balloon popping game with exciting levels. You swipe screen to release a Popper, the popper then bounces from balloon to balloon on its way, popping as many of them as possible.

The idea is to pop balloons in a way to achieve the target of the level. There are power ups to help you on the way. 

Beat the new leader-boards by scoring highest.

New levels are being added every week.
Hope you enjoy playing this game.
